page.title: 15Day in the Life of Linda
page.content: An ordinary day for me would start at 8am when I get up, get washed, dressed then go outside. At about 9am I walk out to the road and Miss Moodie, drives me to school. There I play with my friend Barbara until 9.25am. Then Barbara and I do the weather by finding out the rainfall, temperature and the direction and force of the wind. At 9.30 we start working by doing the work set on the board. At 11.20 we have break. We play piggy in the middle. You play this by having two people at each end then people in the middle. The people at the end try to throw the ball to each other; the ones in the middle have to stop it. At 1135 break ends. We then work until 1pm when we have dinner. We then go out to play. We play cricket and rounders. At 2pm we start school. At 3.30pm school ends. When I get home,
